section.p: This section defines all interventional, surgical, diagnostic, or therapeutic procedures or treatments pertinent to the patient historically at the time the document is generated. The section may contain all procedures for the period of time being summarized, but should include notable procedures.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="47519-4" History of procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-423, CONF-424)
